message: Let's split the money with me getting a bit more this time. It's only fair since I get to propose first.
Since the value of the money is decreasing, I think it's fair for me to propose a split where I get a bit more this round. Let's agree on this and end the game.
Bob, let's be real, neither of us is getting a better deal by dragging this out.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at it further.
